mapper.select: SELECT * FROM prruSignal WHERE timestamp > #{timestamp} and userId = #{userId} and type = #{type} order by timestamp
SELECT * FROM prruFeature WHERE x = #{x} and y = #{y} and floorNo = #{floorNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.*,b.gpp,b.featureValue,b.type,c.floorid,c.mapId FROM prruFeature a join prruFeatureDetail b on a.id = b.featureId left join maps c on a.floorNo = c.floorNo left join store d on c.placeId = d.id WHERE d.id = #{value} ORDER BY a.id
SELECT z FROM locationPhone WHERE userID = #{value} ORDER BY timestamp desc LIMIT 1
